title: Cloth Simulation Playground
description: Built a real-time interactive 3D cloth animation in C++ and OpenGL using mass-spring system dynamics

Incorporated multiple solving methods, self and object collision detection, loop subdivision of constructed mesh, maximum stretch and compression constraints, and various UI features such as configurable environment physics and manual pinning of cloth
Employed local renderer built using Eigen library, with ability to raytrace and rasterize

title: Colour Theory Tester
description: Created an interactive digital painting game in ProcessingJS to test colour theory.
Users blend amounts of red, blue and yellow pigment to achieve a destination colour.

title: 2D Triangle Mesh Generation Library
description: Created a lightweight library that generates 2D triangle meshes for user defined isosurfaces in C++
Includes various options for triangle tiling arrangements, including an all-acute adaptation
Provides option for manual specification of desired triangle side lengths in custom regions of isosurface
